name: Pixel 2020
description:
Submission for the Pixel Weekend game jam, taking place in Corti.

We are a team of four people :

Jean-Baptise Leonelli, Joseph Leonelli, Cyril Trigeau and Orsu.

We made this game in about 48 hours. The themes were Corti and growing.

Thanks to the nice people there for their sweet voices :) (sorry for those we didn't used because we ran out of time!)

The game is meant for an xbox controller, but is playable on a keyboard!

You die when you stay in the dark for too long, pickup the oil reloads

When grue catches you, mash buttons

Lt/E - Interact

WASD/Left stick - Move

P/Start - Respawn

Y/R - Toggle lantern
